item.description:
TC: David Goldsmith dgoldsmith38@aol.com

EVENT: This will be a chance to experience sailing by taking advantage of an opening weekend offer from the Boston Sailing Center. (Please go to their website and click on the link to the Open House to get the details) http://www.bostonsail...
The sail is designed for both first time and seasoned sailors on boats 23 to 40 feet long and we have arranged to get at least one for MOSAIC.

After the sail, those who want to find a place to drink a little Grog and swap yarns about our experiences on the water. will gather for a light meal in town.

RSVP: RSVP by email to:dgoldsmith38@aol.com on or before Wed, April 23rd so we can reserve a boat.
MEET: 12:30, Details will be provided when you RSVP.
COST: $5 for non-MOSAIC members, There is no charge for the sailing.
item.how_to_find_us: Email the trip's coordinator, David : dgoldsmith38@aol.com to sign up and make arrangments.
item.why: This is going to be a great chance to go out for a sail and enjoy the beauty of Boston Harbor and get an early start on the 2008 sailing season.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: SAILING TRIP ALONG BOSTON'S HISTORIC WATERFRONT NEW LISTING
